urls.title: Qatar Airways signs agreement with Estithmar Holding to become Presenting Partner of Lusail Winter Wonderland | Qatar Airways
urls.description: DOHA, Qatar – Qatar Airways is the Official Airline Partner and the Presenting Partner of Lusail Winter Wonderland, an original world-class entertainment and leisure destination in Qatar that will deliver unforgettable experiences to fun seekers of all ages.

urls.title: Track my bag
urls.description: We strive to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your baggage upon your arrival to your destination. You may track its status through any of the options below. Simply enter your bag tag number (assigned to you during check-in) or the booking reference number (the si x-digit alphanumeric code on your booking confirmation) and your last name in the fields below to follow your bag's journey. urls.title: Track my bag
urls.description: We strive to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your baggage upon your arrival to your destination. You may track its status through any of the options below. Simply enter your bag tag number (assigned to you during check-in) or the booking reference number (the si x-digit alphanumeric code on your booking confirmation) and your last name in the fields below to follow your bag's journey.
